column4: i am having a hell of a time with a fresh install of edubuntu on a dell d630 laptop... the wifi does not want to work. i tried reinstalling it but now i cant even see a wifi option up in the network option, help !@!
Are you able to identify the WiFi card?
or do you know what WiFi acrd is installed on your machine?
Broadcom requires a proprietary driver to be installed,
